meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree with opposite leaves and clusters of small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The privets in the garden have beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: The privets along the fence provide privacy for the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns among the privets.
meanings.sent4: The privets stood like sentinels guarding the entrance to the forest.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the privets filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A hedge or boundary made of privet plants.
meanings.sent1: The neighbors trimmed the privets to maintain the neat hedge.
meanings.sent2: The old house was surrounded by a dense wall of privets.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the privets were a perfect place to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The privets formed an impenetrable barrier against the wind.
meanings.sent5: The birds nested safely within the privets, hidden from view.
